explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning techniques for bank risk prediction.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (GA, RF, KNN, SVM, NN) are typically associated with supervised learning tasks, such as classification.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on predicting default risk, which is a classification problem (e.g., classifying applicants as high or low risk).
explanations.support vector machine: SVM is listed as one of the predictive analysis methods used in the research.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is explicitly mentioned in the paper.
explanations.neural network: Neural Network (NN) is listed as one of the predictive analysis methods used.
explanations.random forest: Random Forest (RF) is listed as one of the predictive analysis methods used.
explanations.decision tree: Random Forest is an ensemble method based on decision trees, so decision trees are implicitly relevant.
explanations.k-nearest neighbors: K-Nearest-Neighbor (KNN) is listed as one of the predictive analysis methods used.
explanations.genetic algorithms: Genetic Algorithms (GA) are listed as one of the predictive analysis methods used.
